DOC.brief_summary: To monitor use in real practice including safety and efficacy of Champix tablets 0.5mg, 1mg medication for 12 weeks in smokers
DOC.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance Study To Observe Safety And Efficacy Of ChampixÂ® Tablets
DOC.detailed_description: No sampling method will be applied to this study.
DOC.criteria: Subjects selected for this study are those who would have been prescribed Champix tablets by the physician according to the subject's condition in usual clinical practice.
DOC.keyword: A prospective and observational program to monitor use in real practice including efficacy of Varenicline in Korea.
